questions.question_text: Satsangano āsharo karī sadāy kanthane vishe _______ bevdī mālā dhāran karvī tathā satsanganā niyamo dhāran karvā.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 21 is: Satsangano āsharo karī sadāy kanthane vishe kāshthnī bevdī mālā dhāran karvī tathā satsanganā niyamo dhāran karvā.

questions.question_text: “Āvī Bhagwatswarūp sambandhī je vārtā te to shāstramāthī paṇ potānī meḷe samajāy nahī; ane sadgranthomā āvī vārtā to hoy, paṇ jyāre satpuruṣh pragaṭ thāy chhe tyāre temnā mukh thakī ja vāt samajāymā āve chhe, paṇ potānī buddhi-baḷe karīne sadgranthomāthī paṇ samajātī nathī.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 13.

questions.question_text: Guruṁ _______ tu vinā na saṁbhaved bhave । Tattvato brahmavidyāyāḥ sākṣhātkāro hi jīvane ॥
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 22 is: Guruṁ brahmasvarūpaṁ tu vinā na saṁbhaved bhave । Tattvato brahmavidyāyāḥ sākṣhātkāro hi jīvane ॥

questions.question_text: “Satpuruṣhne viṣhe draḍh prīti e ja ātmadarshannu sāadhan chhe ane satpuruṣhno mahimā jāṇyānu paṇ e ja sāadhan chhe ane Parameshvarnu sākṣhāt darshan thāvānu paṇ e ja sāadhan chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Vartal 11.

questions.question_text: Akṣharbrahma guru vinā Paramātmāno uttam _______ nishchay na thaī shake tathā potānā ātmāne viṣhe brahmabhāv paṇ prāpta na thaī shake.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 23 is: Akṣharbrahma guru vinā Paramātmāno uttam nirvikalp nishchay na thaī shake tathā potānā ātmāne viṣhe brahmabhāv paṇ prāpta na thaī shake.

questions.question_text: “jene ekāntiknā dharmamā sthiti thaī hoy te thakī ja ekāntikno dharma pamāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 60.

questions.question_text: “Swadharma, gnān, vairāgya ane māhātmyagnān teṇe sahit je Bhagwānnī bhakti teṇe yukta evā je Bhagwānnā Ekāntik Sādhu tenā prasang thakī Bhāgwat Dharmanu poṣhaṇ thāy chhe ane vaḷī jīvne mokṣhanu je dvār te paṇ evā Sādhunā prasang thakī ughāḍu thāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 54.

questions.question_text: Nottamo _______ nishchayah Paramātmanaha । Na svātma-brahma-bhāvo’pi Brahmā’kṣharam gurum vinā ॥
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 23 is: Nottamo nirvikalpash-cha nishchayah Paramātmanaha । Na svātma-brahma-bhāvo’pi Brahmā’kṣharam gurum vinā ॥

questions.question_text: “aṣhṭāvarṇe yukta evā je koṭi koṭi brahmānḍ te je Akṣharne viṣhe aṇunī peṭhe jaṇāy chhe, evu je Puruṣhottam Nārāyaṇnu dhāmrūp Akṣhar te rūpe pote rahyo thako Puruṣhottamnī upāsanā kare, tene uttam nirvikalp nishchayvāḷo kahīe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Loya 12.

questions.question_text: “Koṭi janme kasar ṭaḷavānī hoy te āj ṭaḷī jāy ne brahmarūp karī mūke, jo kharekharā sādhu maḷe ne te kahe tem kare to.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Swamini Vato 1/119
